channel.title: The Mr. Linksys Model Contest #1: Kingdom Hearts III
channel.description:
[center][center][IMG]http://i453.photobucket.com/albums/qq251/RuneModelMaker/KingdomHeartsIIIModelContest.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i453.photobucket.com/albums/qq251/RuneModelMaker/OMG.jpg[/img] Hello everyone.
I decided that because of all of the time it is going to take in order to complete this client I am putting together.
I have decided to make a contest.
You can enter whichever model, as long as it is one of the ones you see below. There is an exception if the keyblade you wanna make is just extremely awesome.
The winning models will be put into the client and credit given to the maker.
Rules: 1. It has to be either involved with KHIII or a keyblade. 2. If someone else has already made what you want to make, go for it, the better of the models will be put in and given creds. 3. Model has to be completely colored or it will be disqualified. 4. Only submit something in the following categories.
Categories: NPC's:
Ven:
Terra:
Aqua:
Roxas:
Sora:
Heartless: (Any heartless can be made, if I get enough, I am going to configure a Pest Control game in which you kill heartless)
(Keep in mind that if you feel like making any other important characters costumes from KH2 or KH3 that you may)
Weapons:
Ven's Keyblade:
Terra's Keyblade:
Aqua's Keyblade:
[s]Roxa's Keyblade:[/s] Already Won By Tribbinator
Sora's Keyblade:
Other Keyblades:
Here are some pictures: Roxas' Clothing: [IMG]http://www.kh2.co.uk/assets/kh2/artwork/roxas.png[/img] Sora's Clothing: [IMG]http://campinfinity.cs.luc.edu/Members/session1/group6/kristen/kh2sora_pic[/img] Ven's Armor: [IMG]http://i453.photobucket.com/albums/qq251/RuneModelMaker/321px-Ven_armor.png[/img] Terra's Armor: [IMG]http://i453.photobucket.com/albums/qq251/RuneModelMaker/259px-Terra_armor.png[/img] Aqua's Armor: [IMG]http://i453.photobucket.com/albums/qq251/RuneModelMaker/Aqua_armor.png[/img] Heartless: [IMG]http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/kingdomhearts/images/d/df/Shadow.jpg[/img] Ven's Keyblade: [IMG]http://i453.photobucket.com/albums/qq251/RuneModelMaker/380456-ven_s_keyblade_super-1.jpg[/img] Terra's Keyblade: [IMG]http://i453.photobucket.com/albums/qq251/RuneModelMaker/Terras_Keyblade-3.jpg[/img] Aqua's Keyblade: [IMG]http://i453.photobucket.com/albums/qq251/RuneModelMaker/Aquas_Keyblade-2.jpg[/img] [s]Roxas' Keyblade:[/s] Won By Tribbinator Sora's Keyblade: [IMG]http://th01.deviantart.net/fs23/300W/f/2008/026/1/9/Keyblade___Kingdom_Key_II_by_mogcaiz.png[/img]
Thank you for your time and the contest will end as soon as there are submissions in for every category below:
Ven's Armor Terra's Armor Aqua's Armor Ven's Keyblade Terra's Keyblade Aqua's Keyblade Roxas' Keyblade Sora's Keyblade [Kingdom Key]
More information: 1. The only judge will be me, sorry, but I am extremely critical xD 2. You CAN enter more than one model if you'd like.
Rewards: You will get rep++ A banner saying you have won the 1st Mr. Linksys Model Contest And credits in the client we will be releasing a while after the contest.
A reminder: Take time when making these models, this is one of the biggest projects in Model history. I hope to see that you all have a good time working to make the best model!
Thank you all for viewing! Comments appreciated. [/center][/center]

item.title: The Mr. Linksys Model Contest #1: Kingdom Hearts III
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

I would really like to see someone try the armour lol. I guess it hasn’t been tried because it is obviously the hardest to make. I would try but homework and server is making me very busy. Sorry man.

item.description:
@cashisfun wrote:

Vens keyblade :), used the pic you posted as the reference. Also its only my 3rd ever model :P, hope you like it

EDIT hmm… after lookin at this i think its lookin a lil blocky, ima go smoothen it out. I will post the pics again when im done
*EDIT" doooooneee gunna re-post pics now

wkh0dv.jpg640×554

item.title: The Mr. Linksys Model Contest #1: Kingdom Hearts III
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Linksys Mr. Linksys
item.description:
@Mr_Linksys wrote:

[quote=“TehPea, post:27, topic:333598”]I thought I’d enter this, just for fun, I’ve always liked playing Kingdom Hearts.

Here is my model, Terra’s Keyblade(I know a lot of people have done this, I was going to make Terra’s armor set as well though):

TerrasKeyblade.jpg918×283

Thanks
-TehPea
P.S. Sorry for you whiners that think this is grave digging, deal with it, it’s a contest that’s not over. Therefore, I say it is still active.[/quote]

Hint*
Try and make it a little wider x)

Read full topic

Thanks rip4d… lol…

Anyway, Linksys, you should start a development team, I’d like to help, and I have no doubt Tribb wouldn’t want to at least do modeling. Just a thought I had a little while ago. Do what you want though, I am no man to stop you.

item.title: The Mr. Linksys Model Contest #1: Kingdom Hearts III
item.dc:creator: @TehPea TehPea
item.description:
@TehPea wrote:

I didn’t check the date, I believe it was in the second page, but I don’t remember. I read the damn thing over like 3 times, to see every inch of my competition, then made the model, by then and hour went by and I had no clue.

Anything you would suggest for my model though? I know you’re a great modeller, and I am very lucky to be in a community with many people to give me advice.

Thanks,
-TehPea

Read full topic
